definitions.definition: Any of various marine fish of the genus Sarda that are related to and resemble the tuna , but smaller.
A large tropical fish of  species Katsuwonus pelamis ( skipjack tuna ), allied to the tunny .
The medregal ( Seriola fasciata ), an edible fish of the southern of the United States and the West Indies.
The cobia or crab eater ( Rachycentron canadum ), an edible fish of warm waters globally.

main_definition: Any of various marine fish of the genus Sarda that are related to and resemble the tuna , but smaller. [from 16th c.]
secondary_definitions: A large tropical fish of  species Katsuwonus pelamis ( skipjack tuna ), allied to the tunny .
The medregal ( Seriola fasciata ), an edible fish of the southern of the United States and the West Indies.
The cobia or crab eater ( Rachycentron canadum ), an edible fish of warm waters globally.
